outcomes.text: Your voice cuts through the din of battle. Morale surges and your warriors act with fearless precision.
They obey, but hesitation or doubt lingers. **Choose one**:
bullets: They follow, but at greater cost—suffer losses or spend excess resources
They succeed, but act with brutal zealotry, creating collateral damage
They hesitate at a crucial moment; GM decides the consequence

outcomes.text: Your command falters:
bullets: The troops break and scatter in fear
They misinterpret your order with disastrous results
A rival seizes the moment to undermine your authority

title: Strategic Gambit (+Expertise)
description: Deploy a bold tactical maneuver. After success, you may use **Voice of Dominion** to ensure your orders are followed to the letter.

outcomes.text: Your plan unfolds with uncanny precision. The enemy is caught utterly unprepared.
Your gambit works, but at a price. **Choose one**:
bullets: You suffer losses or sacrifice position
The enemy learns more about your strategy than you'd like
The maneuver leaves you temporarily vulnerable

outcomes.text: Your scheme collapses:
bullets: The enemy anticipates your move and counterattacks brutally
Your forces are mispositioned and at risk
The plan fractures your command's unity—infighting erupts

outcomes.text: All within earshot—or vox-channel—fall silent. Your decree is law; none dare defy you.
Most obey, but not all. **Choose one**:
bullets: A subordinate quietly resents and plots against you
Your authority works, but only for now—expect future rebellion
Obedience is absolute, but instills fear, not loyalty

outcomes.text: Your command sparks defiance:
bullets: Your order is openly challenged
Discipline shatters as factions arise
Your authority is mocked, undermining morale and control

title: Tactical Superiority - Each time taken, add +1 die to tactical rolls

outcomes.text: Your strategic insight is flawless. Enemies fall into your carefully laid traps.
Your tactics succeed, but choose one:
bullets: Victory comes at higher cost than expected
You reveal your strategic approach to watching enemies
Success breeds overconfidence in your ranks

outcomes.text: Your tactics backfire:
bullets: The enemy anticipated your move and counterattacks
Your forces are caught out of position
Morale suffers as troops question your leadership

title: Adaptable - Learn techniques from other roles
Versatile Training - Master multiple specializations
description: Your diverse training allows you to learn the same technique multiple times, each time adapting it to different situations. Each instance is tracked separately.

title: Acquire Dribbles
description: You have encountered and befriended small fast-breeding alien creatures called Dribbles. Each one is unique and makes soft cooo noises. You may acquire up to 10 Dribbles.

title: Inspiring Presence (+Influence)
description: When you rally your troops or inspire others through decisive action, roll **+Influence**. Twice per year you can Rally (hexagon) to prevent an ally dying. This move works well with **Rally the Cohort** when commanding larger forces.

outcomes.text: Your presence fills your allies with determination. **Gain 2 Inspire**. Spend Inspire to:
bullets: An ally gains **+1 forward** to their next roll
Remove one **debility** from yourself or an ally
Rally broken troops - they return to the fight

outcomes.text: Your words carry weight, but the moment is fleeting. **Gain 1 Inspire**.
Your attempt falls flat or backfires:
bullets: Your troops remain demoralized
Someone questions your judgment publicly
The enemy takes advantage of your distraction

title: Improved Stat
description: **Choose one stat** to improve by **+1** (can be taken twice)

title: Battle-Hardened
description: Each time you take this move (up to 3 times), click **max...** and increase your Valor maximum by 2. Spend Valor to reroll any die.

outcomes.text: Your experience grants you resolve. Spend Valor to reroll any die roll.

title: Command Structure
description: Your mastery of military hierarchy allows you to efficiently direct forces at all levels. You may use the following command options:

submoves.title: Give an Order
submoves.description: When you issue a direct command to subordinates in combat, roll **+Influence**.

outcomes.text: They execute your order flawlessly. Take **+1 forward** on any follow-up action.
They carry out your order, but choose one:
bullets: They take longer than expected—lose initiative
They suffer casualties executing the order
They complete it but are now out of position

outcomes.text: Your order is misunderstood or ignored:
bullets: Confusion spreads through the ranks
They hesitate at a critical moment
A subordinate questions your judgment openly

submoves.title: Coordinate Forces
submoves.description: When you orchestrate multiple units working in concert, roll **+Expertise**.

outcomes.text: Perfect synchronization. All units act as one coordinated force. Choose two:
bullets: Maximize tactical advantage—enemies are caught in a pincer
Minimize casualties—your forces fight efficiently
Create an opening—allies gain **+1 forward**
Secure a strategic position

outcomes.text: Coordination holds, but it's not perfect. Choose one from the list above.
Coordination breaks down:
bullets: Units act at cross-purposes, creating chaos
Communication fails at a crucial moment
One unit is isolated and vulnerable
